property.name: channelId
property.label: Channel Id
property.description: Enter the Slack channel ID. The channel ID can be located in the URL when viewing Slack on the web.

property.name: messageSort
property.label: Message Sort
property.datasource: Most Recent on Top, Most Recent on Bottom

property.name: variant
property.label: Display Variant
property.description: Select the layout of the application. Use default for no borders. Use Featured for borders.

property.name: userImgSize
property.label: User Image Size
property.description: Size of the user image from Slack. Small, Medium, Large, None.

property.name: showImages
property.label: Show Image
property.description: Select to display a placeholder instead of the image when an image exists for the Slack message.If unchecked, images will display.All images of a public channel will be displayed; only images in a private channel that have the proper visibility settings will be visible.
